projects.title: AI-Adoption Roadmap for De Heus Myanmar
features: Analyzed key broiler variables for closed and open housing setups
Developed interactive Streamlit dashboards for data visualization
Created predictive models for broiler weight optimization
Delivered actionable AI adoption strategies for agriculture

projects.title: Music Note Detector
projects.description: Built a Flask-based web application that detects musical notes from sheet music images using Jinja2 templates and image-processing algorithms.
features: Implemented an image-processing pipeline to isolate and identify note symbols
Developed RESTful endpoints for uploading and processing sheet music
Rendered dynamic result pages using Jinja2 templates
Integrated TensorFlow models for real-time note classification

projects.title: DragonsSpeak - In Progress
projects.description: A custom online chat platform for D&D campaigns, complete with an inventory system for item tracking and a private “whisper” feature to make party communication effortless.
